com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.arcsoft

Class ASFREngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.arcsoft.AbstractASEngine
      • com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.arcsoft.ASFREngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.capability.Interruptible, com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.capability.Recognizable, com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.capability.Searchable

    public class ASFREngine
extends AbstractASEngine
implements com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.capability.Recognizable, com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.capability.Searchable, com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.capability.Interruptible
    Description: 虹软人脸识别引擎
    Face recognition engine has the ability to recognize faces in an input image and match the known faces in the stored face models.  Extracting Feature：Extract face model from the input image and the detection results.  Comparing Feature：Calculate the similarity of two input face models.  Matching Feature：Match the face models from the input face models and stored face models. If the similarity of two face models is larger than the threshold, the engine determines they belong to the same person.
    Date: 2017/01/16
    Author:
    seven.hu@ubtrobot.com

      • search

        public FacePair search(float similarity,
                       FaceModel model,
                       java.util.List<? extends FaceModel> source)
        Calculate the similarity of input face model and each of face model in the input face model list, and search for the maximum similarity scores. If the maximum is larger than the threshold, the engine determines they belong to the same person.
        Specified by:
        search in interface com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.recognition2.capability.Searchable
        Parameters:
        similarity - threshold value
        model - input face model
        source - input face model list
